properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Matagorda Bay
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 12:38PM CST until January 14 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to less than one mile.

* WHERE...Matagorda Bay and Coastal waters from Freeport to
Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
